item.title: THOR INDUSTRIES INC 10-K
item.description: THOR INDUSTRIES INC, which is in the Motor Homes [3716] industry, SEC 10-K filing on September 28, 2022 had 33839 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 408 instances 2022 - 333 instances fiscal - 297 instances 31 - 272 instances net - 266 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
